long_description: The full Ortovox ABS activation cylinder rapidly inflates the airbags in Ortovox ABS packs (sold separately) to help keep you at or near the snow's surface during an avalanche. Steel cylinder features a threaded attachment valve.
short_description: The full Ortovox ABS activation cylinder rapidly inflates the airbags in Ortovox ABS packs (sold separately) to help keep you at or near the snow's surface during an avalanche.
